title: Week 3 Preview, Bets (home dogs galore)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Jason La Canfora to discuss Richard Sherman's comments on gambling and the NFL (1:15), DeMaurice Smith's re-election (3:05), Jordy Nelson's injury timetable (7:25), and more! Then, Will is joined by Nick Kostos and Pete Prisco to make their picks against the spread for Week 3 (25:07). Their conversation includes talk on the Browns being favored (30:34), a sketchy line for Broncos vs. Bills (37:40), how to approach Vikes-Bucs with Sam Bradford uncertainty (47:50), avoiding any wagers on the Giants' offensive line (52:09), and a full slate of home underdogs and their best bets!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Will Brinson, Jason La Canfora, Nick Kostos and Pete Prisco discuss what you need to know heading into Week 3 of the NFL season, including top storylines and bets against the spread.
